item.title: debugger; - JavaScript/Web Developer Black Text Design Sticker by geeksta
item.description: Computer programmers and software developers who write JavaScript code use the "debugger;" statement to add a breakpoint to stop program execution at the point, where it occurs in the code. Show your love for web development & JS with this simple design.
